attributes.action: Schools should allow children to have any hair cut choice they like.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that children and teenagers should embrace whatever hair choice, hair colour, hair style, hair cut, they want" and not be judged by any means, a hair cut should be ones expression of oneself. No human on this planet should have to follow a system about how to look or how to have their hair. We are all individuals with different personalities. Children should be happy to be themselves in a school and should be made  to feel comfortable. A hair cut should not be judged or catorgrised.
attributes.background: I want schools all across the country to let the children have whatever hair cut or hair style or hair colour. They want" with no judgement or ruling.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611540
